It is a core support function that bridges the import analysis system with Python's actual import process.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9f7b5a1c-feb7-4aca-a28f-edef226221e7","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Purpose","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cda89d8c-72ca-48a5-8829-e82bfb52aba5","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This function handles the practical task of loading modules. Summary","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"39196d76-9843-485d-944f-b1dbf8575aac","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"javascript"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Input:
  mod_name → module name to import
  package  → package context (for relative imports)

Process:
  1. Filter pdb module (skip)
  2. Check if already loaded in sys.modules
     ├─ Yes → Record edge, store path, return module
     └─ No → Attempt to find and load
  3. Find module spec using importlib
     ├─ Found → Create module from spec
     └─ Not found → Try direct import (fallback)
  4. Return loaded module

Output:
  Loaded module object, updated graph edges/metadata","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"f91c89d8-62f2-4277-bf97-66b3dfc75c92","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"6ec4b6bf-352a-4c9a-b904-52114985a5e3","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Two Loading Paths","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"97416270-56ac-4759-83e9-cf89891e1c83","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Path 1: Already-Loaded Module","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9d3ca341-1d10-44a6-baac-40cbad080c54","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"if mod_name in sys.modules:
    mod = sys.modules[mod_name]
    self.create_edge(mod_name)
    self.create_node(mod_name)
    self.set_filepath(mod_name, mod.__file__)
    return sys.modules[mod_name]","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"6f7d0e55-7faa-4d31-a0b2-2aacac2dad9d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the module is already in memory, record its dependency information and return it immediately.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"cf109ac5-c4c5-417d-bdf5-7e6b8378ff68","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Path 2: New Module Discovery","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"3b9b4c22-7fb4-4133-9661-b4bb0780ca74","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"module_spec = importlib.util.find_spec(mod_name, package=package)
if module_spec is None:
    return importlib.import_module(mod_name, package=package)
return importlib.util.module_from_spec(module_spec)","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"58e6a462-ffa2-49e1-8fb8-3b62f9b7ce20","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"If the module is new, locate it, and load it (or attempt a fallback import).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"74a84e85-1be4-4865-91b4-d3929ffb787b","type":"divider","props":{},"children":[]},{"id":"5c447bbc-f6cd-4fa9-a6ad-1e01d8fd9efa","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":2,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Special Cases","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"7b8a954f-7af0-41c2-a220-4c8620c5f4c5","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"PDB Module Filtering","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"9b9bd55d-25be-43e3-be80-e3635bd1d192","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"if mod_name == 'pdb':
    return","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"8a688874-04b3-42be-96b3-10d2ed0849f0","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"pdb","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" debugger module is explicitly skipped to avoid interference with debugging workflows.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bcdc2b78-0da8-4ce2-ac10-131a885c3581","type":"heading","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left","level":3,"isToggleable":false},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Modules Without File Paths","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e55b1176-5932-4825-af00-1184e8e48c9a","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"if not hasattr(mod, "__file__") or not mod.__file__:
    return","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e70d3a32-4988-4ff5-bc37-ec39d3bb724a","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Modules
